        public static void play(java.lang.String mov,
        Hero h,
        Sword s,
        Maze m,
        java.util.ArrayList<Drake> d)
        Responsible for putting the game logic in action to be able to play the game (checks conditions, calls movement functions...)
        Parameters:
        mov - String containing the char representation of the movement the hero will take
        h - Hero in game
        s - Sword in game
        m - Original maze
        d - ArrayList containing all drakes in game

        Checks if either the eagle or the hero are killed by a dragon
        Parameters:
